video_description: What else could add more variety to your life than a HANNSpad? What else could do a better job at leading you into a tech paradise than a HANNSpad? The best web browsing, instant messaging, video and photo viewing is all available at the touch of your fingertips. Experience the unprecedented convenience, entertainment, and amusement it provides. Travel the world over with just one device!
title: 10.1" HANNSpad Android Tablet by HANNspree

comments.text: WHY DOESN'T﻿ THIS HAVE ANDROID MARKET!!!!
comments.author: Benedictninja

comments.text:
Please be patient we are working on it!
Please follow our youtube or facebook channels for the updates!
In case of any further questions please feel free to contact us :)﻿
comments.author: HANNspreeEU

comments.text:
I used to have a Archos 10.1 tablet, but ended up selling it; because of its lack of out the house portability. 10" is too large to just stick in your pocket, and it refused﻿ to tether to any phone.

This is very cheap for a Tegra 2 tablet, but it's still got the two problems my previous tablet had. If there was a 7" version, with good phone tethering support, then maybe I'd be interested.
comments.author: AnnoyedDragon

comments.text: Please look out for Hannspree updates.﻿ We may surprise you some day :)
comments.author: HANNspreeEU

comments.text: : What﻿ does that mean...are you going to issue a new ROM or even Android 3.0 Honeycomb for this device?
comments.author: Gonzo21077

comments.text:
Hey,
For now we cannot give you any official information.
Please look forward for any upcoming news.
If you are based in Germany or willing to travel feel free to visit us at IFA 2011 where﻿ you will be able to see a lot of new products from Hannspree.
Otherwise, do not worry, we will try to prepare videos or photos from this event.
comments.author: HANNspreeEU

comments.text:
please help me

whenever i try to get an﻿ app from its app store it says ' internet certificate not trusted'

comments.text: Please allow us some time I passed your problem to our product manager hopefully he will comeback with﻿ the solution.
comments.author: HANNspreeEU

comments.text:
Hey,
This problem occurs when the date or the time of the unit is not
set. Please﻿ set current date and time.
That should solve the problem.
Please let us know the result!
comments.author: HANNspreeEU

comments.text: many﻿ thanks it worked!! :)

comments.text: When I say eBay,﻿ it's actually from British site eBuyer
comments.author: Phil K

comments.text: ﻿ cool :)
comments.author: meezyrmcrs4ever

comments.text: Just received mine today from eBuyer, even though they said it would be the new model "1653" I received the old one. Tried it out anyway and have to say the viewing angles are﻿ really bad, the slightest tilt and you can't see half the detail on the screen. Shame really as it looks a good tab. Sending mine back as I can't live with the poor screen :(
comments.author: p1nch3z

comments.text:
Hello,
I am really sorry to hear about your bad experience.
I am sure you can return the product to﻿ eBuyer.
Should you wish to test our tablet and try it out before purchase please visit our store in Westfield London.

Thank you and sorry for any inconvenience caused.
comments.author: HANNspreeEU

comments.text:
Yeah, me too. Odd how often those who expressed a desire for the new one, got the old one.
eBuyer's MD got involved after the flood of complaints - the dispatch types said﻿ they "couldn't guarantee" a 653 in exchange as they couldn't seprate the types. The MD had them seperate them in an HOUR. eBuyer have major problems with their workers I'd say.
comments.author: PhilK22

comments.text: I sent mine back aswell because it was the 1633 model number and I requested the 1653 model. I am waiting for the next tablet, but on ebay and ebuyer website it is written that this is the 1653  model. I hope the next one will be the﻿ good one.
comments.author: szsergiu

comments.text: Received my 1653 from misco and must say the screen is much better, already have the latest flashback (honeycomb) rom running and I'm very impressed. Also just received my﻿ refund from eBuyer :)
comments.author: p1nch3z

comments.text: That Is great news!!!﻿
comments.author: HANNspreeEU

comments.text: I have a 1653 and its not buggy but since the last update in August the browser flags bad certificates﻿ for all web sites, will it ever get the android market?
comments.author: RogueBrit

comments.text: no where do I find it saying the model﻿ number ... I tried both ebuyer and misco
comments.author: nasaralla

comments.text: The model number isn't listed on﻿ Misco's site but I asked them what model number they had and they said we only have stock of the new (1653) ones. So I ordered and indeed received a "1653" couldn't be happier :)
comments.author: p1nch3z

comments.text:
Please not that in UK there are only two tablets available:
1) SN10T1
2) SN10T2
Numbers which you write about (1653 and 1633) are the indication for the screen S/N not the﻿ model of the Tablet.
comments.author: HANNspreeEU

comments.text:
Lets be honest all that matters is the screen as except for that they're both identical and when I or anyone else refers to them by "1633" or "1653" end users and retailers alike know exactly what﻿ is meant.

The bigger questions are

1) Why did you ship the Hannspad with such a poor screen in the first place?

2) Are you going to support this device with an official Honeycomb update or at least release the rom so others can do it?

Thanks
comments.author: p1nch3z

comments.text: this looks like a great tablet. I just wish it came with stock honeycomb and not 2.2 with a custom ui.. I'm gonna buy it on ebuyer today and just put the flashback rom on it... if i can figure it out :P ﻿
comments.author: petior123

comments.text:
@thefakemuska 
Please contact our Service department to repair fault.
You can find appropriate service contact details on our website.
or send me private message.
This is unusual that our tablets are getting frozen but it does happen, we are sorry about that issue and we do our best to resolve this problem as soon as possible.
One of the solutions could be to update firmware.
Thank you﻿ for your comment!

comments.text:
@thefakemuska 
No problem.

comments.author: HANNspreeEU

comments.text:
Totally given up on this tablet without even using it. :(
I ordered it and asked for 1653 model. Got the 1633 model and the viewing angle was so﻿ bad that the slightest movement would make it unusable
I returned it and got the 1653 model, i was so happy when i unpacked it, until i turned it on. I have never gotten a screen as bad as this one. Half the screen is in negative when looking right at it, have to look from around a corner or turn the tablet side ways to be able to see the screen fully.
comments.author: 100percentmobile
